name: Amenity
short_description:
Market trade analysis application for use with Eve Online.
https://www.ohloh.net/p/Amenity

Designed to collect multiple market exports from your EVE Online installation and present valuable information in a clear format. The project can currently manage all logs and archive them automatically removing duplicates and allowing for trend analysis at a later date.

Current features include:
 P2P Item Trading
 Trip calculation between multiple locations
 In-game browser support

Current data files are outdated which may cause problems when attempting to process new objects.
Development to continue shortly after the completion of new web server code is made public and forked to a separate project.
